H0.text: who was judi dench married to. Ian Holm

H1.text: who was judi dench married to. Ian McKellen

H2.text: who was judi dench married to. Richard Attenborough

H3.text: who was judi dench married to. Michael Williams

A4.text: Dench married actor Michael Williams in February 1971 at St Mary's Church, Hampstead; they remained together until his death from lung cancer in 2001.
